message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This exceptional value provides not only the standard features but also includes exclusive benefits and services that will enhance your experience. We believe this is a fair and generous offer considering the high quality and uniqueness of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While the product sounds good,  $12,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $8,000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position, and I would like to make a counterproposal. Considering the value and quality of the product, I am willing to negotiate further. How about we agree on a price of $9,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  However, $9,500 is still a little bit over my budget. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,000?
